description.title: description
description.text:
The course teaches:
1. Conductng UX Research and Test Early Concepts
2. Build Dynamic User Interfaces (UI) for Websites
3. Start the UX Design Process: Empathize, Define, and Ideate

description.title: description
description.text: The Japanese-Language Proficiency Test, or JLPT, is a standardised criterion-referenced test to evaluate and certify Japanese language proficiency for non-native speakers, covering language knowledge, reading ability, and listening ability.

description.title: description
description.text: I learnt how to create data models for MongoDB. The course went through a few techniques, from a very simple process for simple schemas to more complex ones for large teams and large projects.

description.title: description
description.text: The Hanyu Shuiping Kaoshi, translated as the Chinese Proficiency Test, is the standardised test of Standard Chinese language proficiency of Mainland China for non-native speakers such as foreign students and overseas Chinese.

description.title: description
description.text: The topics covered include Object Orientation, with practice in writing classes and interfaces. The course also gave countless practice problems for methods with loops and if else statements, exception handling and file processing as well as how to debug software using Eclipse. The course also taught the collections framework and dived deep into java generics. Furthermore, it taught multi-threading and the JDBC API for working with a MySQL database. There are also practical projects scattered throughout the course to practice the concepts. For example one of the projects is related to a car dealership management system and another assignment involves processing files with stock market data.

description.title: description
description.text: The course taught fundamentals in frontend design, including using technologies such as **Tailwind.css** and <<../merits/languages/php>>PHP</>.

description.text: The Hanyu Shuiping Kaoshi, translated as the Chinese Proficiency Test, is the standardised test of Standard Chinese language proficiency of Mainland China for non-native speakers such as foreign students and overseas Chinese.

description.title: description
description.text: The course taught execution pipelines, curve fitting, regression, classification, CNNs, RNNs, autoencoders and backpropogation.

description.title: description
description.text:
The course teaches:
1. Fundamental R programming skills
2. Statistical concepts such as probability, inference, and modeling and how to apply them in practice
3. Gain experience with the tidyverse, including data visualization with ggplot2 and data wrangling with dplyr
4. Become familiar with essential tools for practicing data scientists such as Unix/Linux, git and GitHub, and RStudio
5. Implement machine learning algorithms
6. In-depth knowledge of fundamental data science concepts through motivating real-world case studies

description.title: description
description.text:
The course teaches:
1. Fundamentals of Python
2. Data Structures
3. Web scraping with HTML, XML and JSON
4. Database interaction, data processing and data visualisation

description.title: background
description.text: I took this course after my O levels, before entering my JC. I finished it quite quickly, taking about one week to complete the entire course. Afterwards, I continued learning Python and creating some simple projects of my own.
